fields.about_text: I am a software developer based in the Green Heart of the Netherlands. I enjoy solving puzzles and tackling problems, as well as making things intuitive and easy to use. I have an insatiable desire to keep learningâ€” the more, the better. I also have a passion for video creation, a hobby I've taken on vacations ever since the days of camcorders. Oh, and games! I have a deep love for Nintendo games.
fields.projects_text: Here's a list of the projects I've been working on lately. All of these were built during my coding adventure on Code Institute, where I've been coding for almost 7 months non-stop until I completed all the milestone projects required to get my diploma in software development.
